JyutpingA: ngo5 ge3 hing3 ceoi3 hai6 haang4 saan1

JyutpingQ: dim2 gaai2 nei5 zung1 ji3 haang4 saan1?
JyutpingA: jan1 wai6 ngo5 zung1 ji3 daai6 zi6 jin4

ChineseA: 我係資訊科技軟件工程師
JyutpingA: ngo5 hai6 zi1 seon3 gei6 suk6 jyun5 gin2 gung1 cing4 si1
EnglishA: I am an IT software engineer

JyutpingQ: nei5 zou6 bin1 go3 hang4 jip6?
EnglishQ: What field do you work in?
JyutpingA: ngo5 zou6 zi1 seon3 gei6 suk6

JyutpingQ: nei5 hai2 hoeng1 gong2 zyu6 zo2 gei2 noi6?
EnglishQ: How long have you lived in Hong Kong?
EnglishA: I have lived here for 5 years

JyutpingQ: nei5 saang1 jat6 hai6 gei2 si4?
JyutpingA: ngo5 saang1 jat6 hai6 ji6 jyut6 sap6 ji6 hou6

JyutpingQ: nei5 gei2 si4 lei4 hoeng1 gong2?
EnglishQ: What year did you arrive in Hong Kong?
ChineseA: 我二零二零年嚟咗香港
JyutpingA: ngo5 ji6 ling4 ji6 ling4 nin4 lei4 zo2 hoeng1 gong2
EnglishA: I arrived in Hong Kong in 2020
